products.name: The Legend of Zynthara
products.overview: An epic action-adventure game where you uncover the lost relics of Zynthara.
products.long_description: Explore vast lands, battle ancient enemies, and discover the secret of Zynthara's power in this action-packed adventure. Featuring stunning visuals and immersive gameplay.

products.name: Cyber Assault: Neon Wars
products.overview: Enter the world of Neon Wars, a futuristic cyber battle royale game.
products.long_description: Gear up and join the Neon Wars. Choose your character, customize your weapons, and fight to become the ultimate cyber warrior in this intense multiplayer experience.

products.name: Fantasy Kingdom: Battle for Power
products.overview: Build your kingdom and defend it from invaders in this strategy game.
products.long_description: Lead your army, build defenses, and expand your territory in Fantasy Kingdom. With various battle modes and resource management, the battle for the throne has just begun.

products.name: Galactic Raiders
products.overview: A thrilling space exploration and combat game set in distant galaxies.
products.long_description: Join the Galactic Raiders in a quest to explore unknown planets, trade resources, and engage in epic space battles. Your journey to conquer the stars starts here.

products.name: Mystic Quest: Shadows of the Lost Realm
products.overview: Embark on a journey to save the lost realm in this RPG.
products.long_description: Experience the world of Mystic Quest where magic and mystery collide. Build your party, learn powerful spells, and defeat ancient evils lurking in the shadows.
